wired.title: Senate Report Slams Automakers for Leaving Cars Vulnerable to Hackers
wired.topComment: I worry less about some malicious hacker than I do about the manufacturers ramping up their remote monitoring and the increasing use of 'nanny controls' which limit my use of the car's full potential.

wired.title: A Pixelated Platform Game That Never Plays the Same Way Twice
wired.topComment: This article reads like you've never played a roguelike in your life.

wired.title: Don't Make a Three-Parent Baby. Adopt Instead
wired.topComment: "genetic fetishism"? Oh please! There is nothing wrong with desiring a child that looks like you, or has some of your traits. When I look at pictures of my father and grandfather at my age, it's like looking at pictures of myself from a different tim...
